EmailTemplate.description: User Announcements for Sprint 27A - Changes to Opportunities and Tour Booking
EmailTemplate.name: Upcoming Salesforce Changes 27A
EmailTemplate.subject: PLEASE READ: Feature Updates in Salesforce - 5/10/18
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
This week's release contains an update to our Journey and Opportunity pages. We also have an update our manage tour page.
Journey: Unqualified options
We have updated our picklist values for the unqualified journey.
Opportunity: Tour booked by
We have added tour booked by to the opportunity page.
Manage Tour: Product Line Product line item is now pre-populated on the tour when booking multiple tours
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us at salesforcesupport@wework.com
Best,
Tykira
